webauthn-desc: Provides authentication support using WebAuthn protocol
webauthn-javascript-required: JavaScript must be enabled in your browser to use a security key.
webauthn-ui-login-prompt: Please touch your security key or follow the instructions from the browser.
webauthn-error-browser-unsupported: This browser does not support security key authentication, or it is not available for this website. Please try with a different browser. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:WebAuthn#Browser_support Read more]
webauthn-error-browser-unsupported-conso: This browser does not support security key authentication, or it is not available for this website.
webauthn-error-auth-generic: Authentication process was interrupted. Please start the authentication process again.
webauthn-error-reg-generic: Could not verify your key. Please start the registration process again.
webauthn-error-invalid-new-key: New key returned by the module is not of required type.
webauthn-ui-key-register-help: Choose the nickname for your key:
webauthn-error-get-authinfo-fail: Authentication information could not be retrieved.
webauthn-error-get-reginfo-fail: Registration information could not be retrieved.
webauthn-module-description:
WebAuthn is in an experimental state. It currently provides no recovery option for lost or damaged authentication devices. 

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebAuthn Learn more about WebAuthn]
webauthn-authentication-info-help: Authentication data passed to the client for credential retrieval
webauthn-credential-help: User credential based on authentication data
apierror-webauthn-module-missing: The WebAuthn module is not available.
apierror-webauthn-invalid-credential: The credential data is invalid or malformed.
apierror-webauthn-reauthenticate: You must first reauthenticate through Special:OATHManage before you can take this action.
apihelp-webauthn-paramvalue-func-registe: Register a new WebAuthn credential for the current user.
apihelp-webauthn-param-credential: JSON-encoded WebAuthn credential response from the browser.
apihelp-webauthn-param-friendlyname: Friendly name for the new credential.
